meanings.definition: A person or thing that unitizes.
meanings.sent1: The factory worker was the unitizers of the production line.
meanings.sent2: The unitizers on the team ensured everything was packed efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The little robot acted as the unitizers, organizing all the toys in the playroom.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the magical wand was the unitizers, bringing harmony to the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The unitizers in the puzzle game helped put all the pieces together perfectly.

meanings.definition: To make into a single, unified whole.
meanings.sent1: She carefully unitizers the scattered papers into a neat stack.
meanings.sent2: The chef unitizers the ingredients to create a delicious dish.
meanings.sent3: The students decided to unitizers their efforts for a successful school project.
meanings.sent4: The artist unitizers various colors to paint a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The conductor unitizers the musicians to perform a harmonious symphony.
